knowledgeBoxes.title: What is Google Wallet?
knowledgeBoxes.content: Digital payment system allowing users to make contactless payments using smartphones. Launched in Pakistan in 2024, enabling secure transactions at retail outlets.

knowledgeBoxes.title: CPEC Milestone
knowledgeBoxes.content: China-Pakistan Economic Corridor has completed 70% of infrastructure projects with $25 billion total investment. Major highways, power plants, and Gwadar Port development underway.

knowledgeBoxes.title: Pakistan's Nuclear Program
knowledgeBoxes.content: Pakistan became the 7th nuclear state in 1998. Dr. Abdul Qadeer Khan led the uranium enrichment program. Currently maintains strategic deterrence capability.
